skills.name: Trial by Fire
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Innate:}} Every few seconds, Gangplank's next basic attack will burn the target, continually dealing {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} and granting him {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
Whenever a ''{{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}'' explodes, ''Trial by Fire's'' cooldown will {{sti|ah|reset}} '''Gangplank''' will gain the {{as|movement speed}}.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Gangplank''' periodically empowers his next [[basic attack]] to burn the target, dealing them{{ft|{{pp|55/10 to 225/10|color=true damage}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over {{fd|2.5}} seconds.|{{pp|55 to 225|color=true damage}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds.}} {{tip|turret|Turrets}} receive 50% reduced damage.

If '''Gangplank''' successfully hits a target with ''Trial by Fire'', he gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds. Every time a {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} explodes, the {{sti|cooldown}} for ''Trial by Fire'' resets and '''Gangplank''' gains its {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
''Trial by Fire'' cannot be applied with {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} nor {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Gangplank periodically empowers his next basic attack to burn the target, dealing them Turrets receive 50% reduced damage.
If Gangplank successfully hits a target with Trial by Fire, he gains 30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Every time a Gangplank's Powder Keg explodes, the cooldown for Trial by Fire resets and Gangplank gains its bonus movement speed.
Trial by Fire cannot be applied with Gangplank's Parrrley nor Gangplank's Powder Keg.
skills.notes:
* Unlike most [[damage over time]] debuffs, reapplying ''Trial by Fire'' before a previous application has run out will stack the full damage, instead of just refreshing the duration.
* {{Pending for test}}: Interaction with ''parries'' ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, and {{tip|blind}}).
** If the attack is {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, the effect is not applied nor does ''Trial by Fire'' go on cooldown.

skills.name: Parrrley
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Gangplank}} shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and applying {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects.
If this attack kills the target, he gains {{g|gold}} and {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} upon the bullet's arrival and applying {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
''Parrrley'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
If ''Parrrley'' kills the target, '''Gangplank''' plunders {{gold|gold}} and {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}}, the latter of which can be spent to upgrade {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gangplank shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing them physical damage upon the bullet's arrival and applying on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
Parrrley can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage.
If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders Unknown value: gold / gold and Gangplank's Silver Serpents, the latter of which can be spent to upgrade Gangplank's Cannon Barrage.
leveling: {{st|Gold Plunder|{{g|{{ap|3 to 7}}}}|Silver Serpent Plunder|{{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank|icononly=yes}} {{ap|4 to 8}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Parrrley'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* {{tip|On-hit}} effects that deal area of effect damage will allow ''Parrrley'' to plunder from every enemy killed. This includes enemies killed by '''Gangplank's''' {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank|Powder Kegs}} when activated by ''Parrrley''.

effects.str:
• Gold Plunder:
  • Silver Serpent Plunder: Gangplank's Silver Serpents

skills.name: Remove Scurvy
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Gangplank}} eats citrus to {{tip|cleanse}} {{tip|crowd control}} effects and {{tip|heal}} based on {{as|his '''missing''' health}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} himself from all {{tip|crowd control}} and {{tip|heal|healing}} himself.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, cleansing himself from all crowd control and healing himself.
skills.notes:
* ''Remove Scury'' does not remove {{tip|debuff|debuffs}} other than {{tip|crowd control}}, even if both occur from the same effect. For example, ''Remove Scurvy'' will dispel the {{tip|slow}} from {{si|Exhaust}}, but not its [[damage modifier|damage reduction]].
* ''Remove Scurvy'' can remove the underlying {{tip|stun}} from {{tip|airborne}}, but a {{tip|blink}} or {{tip|dash}} ability is required to override the displacement.

effects.str: • Heal: (+ 90% AP) (+ 15% missing health)

skills.name: Powder Keg
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} {{ci|Gangplank}} stocks a ''Powder Keg'' every few seconds, up to a maximum of 3.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' places a ''Powder Keg'' at the target location, which can be basic attacked or {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank|shot}} to damage it. If an enemy destroys a ''Powder Keg'', it is safely dismantled.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Gangplank''' periodically [[stocks]] a ''Powder Keg'', up to a maximum of 3.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' places a ''Powder Keg'' at the target location for 25 seconds, which connects to other nearby ''Powder Kegs'' with overlapping connection radius.

'''Gangplank''' and his enemies can attack the ''Powder Keg'' with basic attacks, dealing 1 damage per hit. '''Gangplank''' may also shoot the barrel with {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}. If '''Gangplank''' scores the killing blow, it explodes, also triggering a chain reaction that explodes nearby connected ''kegs'' with a {{fd|0.3}}-delay between explosions. If killed by an enemy, the ''keg'' is safely dismantled.

An exploding ''keg'' grants {{tip|sight}} of its explosion radius for 2 seconds and deals the {{as|attack's damage}} to all enemies within the area, plus {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} against {{tip|champions}}, ignoring {{as|40% of each enemy's {{sti|armor penetration|armor}}}}, as well as {{tip|slowing}} and {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 2 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once per chain.

Attacking a ''keg'' with {{nie|Spellblade}} will consume the effect. If '''Gangplank''' applies it, the ''keg'' will store the damage it would have dealt and add it to the explosion damage as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} if it is the initial detonation of a chain.
Barrel deterioration speed increases at levels {{as|7}} and {{as|13}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg, up to a maximum of 3.
Active: Gangplank places a Powder Keg at the target location for 25 seconds, which connects to other nearby Powder Kegs with overlapping connection radius.
Gangplank and his enemies can attack the Powder Keg with basic attacks, dealing 1 damage per hit. Gangplank may also shoot the barrel with Gangplank's Parrrley. If Gangplank scores the killing blow, it explodes, also triggering a chain reaction that explodes nearby connected kegs with a 0.3-delay between explosions. If killed by an enemy, the keg is safely dismantled.
An exploding keg grants sight of its explosion radius for 2 seconds and deals the attack's damage to all enemies within the area, plus bonus physical damage against champions, ignoring 40% of each enemy's armor, as well as slowing and revealing them for 2 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once per chain.
Attacking a keg with Spellblade will consume the effect. If Gangplank applies it, the keg will store the damage it would have dealt and add it to the explosion damage as bonus physical damage if it is the initial detonation of a chain. Barrel deterioration speed increases at levels 7 and 13.
skills.notes:
* Placed barrels do '''not''' grant {{tip|sight|vision}} until they explode, but they are revealed to '''Gangplank'''.
** If '''Gangplank''' loses allied vision, for instance due to {{tip|nearsight}}, he will also lose vision on his barrels temporarily.
** Barrels prematurely grant {{tip|sight}} of their explosion radius (including across terrain and into bushes) if {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} or a lit fuse is travelling towards them.
*** This area reveal happens even if {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} is not going to make it explode.
* An exploding ''Powder Keg'' will splash {{ais|Parrrley|Gangplank}} '''bonus''' damage, and will also be modified if the attack {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}}.
* Attacks against ''Powder Kegs'' will apply [[on-hit]] effects (such as {{iis|Tiamat}} {{nie|Cleave}}), but {{tip|proc damage}} against the barrel itself is reduced to 0.
** Damage from [[on-hit]] effects will '''not''' increase the damage of the explosion.
** {{tip|Spellblade}} is a {{tt|special-cased exception|Since late Season 9 - previously, Spellblade worked simply because it would add to the attack's damage directly}}.
* Notes regarding the {{tip|Spellblade}} interaction:
** The attack with Spellblade can be but does '''not''' have to be the one to trigger the explosion.
** The stored damage is static and will not change if '''Gangplank''' gains {{as|'''base''' attack damage}} by leveling up or exchanges his ''Spellblade'' item.
*** If a ''keg'' that is storing ''Spellblade'' damage is attacked with a new instance of ''Spellblade'', it will override the previously stored damage (if different).
** The {{as|magic damage}} of {{ii|Lich Bane}} is fully applied, but effectively converted to {{as|physical damage}}.
* {{iis|Dead Man's Plate}} {{nie|Crushing Blow}} will not trigger from ''Powder Kegs'' destroyed from '''Gangplank''', even with {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}.

effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage:
  • Slow: %

skills.name: Cannon Barrage
skills.effect_radius: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|580|Volley damage and Raise Morale effect radius}}
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Gangplank}} orders a cannon bombardment to the target location, each blast deals {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies within.
'''Gangplank''' can improve ''Cannon Barrage'' by purchasing upgrades in the shop with {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for the duration. Each wave deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''Gangplank''' can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500 {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}} each, which improve ''Cannon Barrage'':

{{sbc|{{ii|Death's Daughter}}:}} An initial cannonball lands in the center of the barrage, dealing a cluster's worth of {{as|true damage}} to all enemies within the impact and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ii|Raise Morale}}:}} The barrage grants allies {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while they are inside the area, persisting for 2 seconds after leaving it.
{{sbc|{{ii|Fire at Will}}:}} ''Cannon Barrage'' fires{{ft|6 additional waves|2 additional clusters}} over its duration.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting sight of the area for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
Gangplank can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500 Gangplank's Silver Serpents each, which improve Cannon Barrage:
The item: Death's Daughter: An initial cannonball lands in the center of the barrage, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to all enemies within the impact and slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.
The item: Raise Morale: The barrage grants allies 30% bonus movement speed while they are inside the area, persisting for 2 seconds after leaving it.
The item: Fire at Will: Cannon Barrage fires over its duration.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Wave|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Cluster|{{ap|40*3 to 100*3}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}

{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40*12 to 100*12}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage with
''Fire at Will''|{{ap|40*18 to 100*18}} {{as|(+ 180% AP)}}|Maximum Mixed Total Damage with
''Fire at Will'' and ''Death's Daughter''|{{ap|40*21 to 100*21}} {{as|(+ 210% AP)}}}}
skills.notes: * ''Cannon Barrage's'' slow lingers for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after affected enemies leave the target area.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Wave: (+ 10% AP)
  • Magic Damage Per Cluster: (+ 30% AP)

• Total Magic Damage: (+ 120% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage with
    Fire at Will    : (+ 180% AP)
  • Maximum Mixed Total Damage with
    Fire at Will and Death's Daughter    : (+ 210% AP)
